description: Master this gozleme recipe that uses succulent lamb, haloumi and fragrant herbs. It's a great way to use up holiday leftovers!
name: Lamb & Haloumi Gozleme Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roll each gozleme into a 23cm square. Brush gozleme with remaining oil. Heat a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook gozleme, one at a time, for 4 minutes on each side or until golden and dough is cooked through. Cut gozleme into wedges and serve with lemon and extra mint.
